name: Just Some Shapes Racing ONLINE VERSION
name_original: Just Some Shapes Racing ONLINE VERSION
description:
Which shape do you think is the fastest on the track? Jump in and burn rubber in this fun racing game!

  • Controls (Singleplayer)
    • W - Forward
    • S - Reverse
    • A/D - Turn Left/Right
    • P - Pause
  • Controls (Two-Player)
    • Player One - WASD
    • Player Two - Arrow Keys
    • P - Pause

(Note: You may notice the lack of music. In a later update I will slap some tunes in the game. But in the meantime, I hope you enjoy the game as is until then.)
